title: New BITMAIN Antminer L7 9050M ASIC Miner Dogecoin & Litecoin Miner (0.36J/TH, 3260W, 220V), Air-Cooling Crypto Mining Machine, w/PSU
body_html:
Brand: Antminer

Features:

  • 【High Hashrate】The Antminer L7 9050M boasts an impressive hashrate of 9050 MH/s ±3%, making it a powerful choice for SHA256-based cryptocurrencies like LTC and doge coin.
  • 【Efficient Power Usage】With a power consumption of 3260W ±10%, the miner maintains efficient operations, complemented by a power efficiency of 0.36 J/TH ±10% at 77°F (25°C).
  • 【Robust Power Supply】The power supply supports a wide range of input conditions, including AC input voltage between 200 and 240 V, an input frequency range of 47~63 Hz, and a current of 20 Amp.
  • 【Adaptable Environment】Designed for diverse conditions, the L7 9050M operates in temperatures ranging from 32~113°F, with a storage temperature range of -4~158°F.
  • ※IMPORTANT※ For brand new BITMAIN Antminer units, if the return is not due to product quality issues, a 40% restocking fee will be applied. Please carefully consider your purchase before making a decision.

Binding: Personal Computers

Details: ※IMPORTANT※
Brand New BITMAIN Antminer units come with warranty coverage provided by BITMAIN. We are not responsible for the warranty; therefore, customers are required to proactively contact BITMAIN's official website, where dedicated personnel will assist you.

The power cord was NOT INCLUDED in the package originally. Please use 220-277V Voltage; wrong input voltage may probably cause miner damage.
